citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"e7b2ee2e-97b1-4203-b277-81c3805da2b2\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"05\", \"24\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 632518 a \u00e9t\u00e9 d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 le 2023-08-23 au Baynes Sound. Baynes Sound est situ\u00e9e entre Denman Island et l\u2019\u00cele de Vancouver. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxyg\u00e8ne. Les capteurs d'oxyg\u00e8ne mesurent la concentration d'oxyg\u00e8ne dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 deploy\u00e9 sur une plateforme fixe. Les donn\u00e9es de ce d\u00e9ploiement sont archiv\u00e9es et accessibles sur l\u2019infrastructure num\u00e9rique Oceans 3.0 du R\u00e9seau Canadien des Oc\u00e9ans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualit\u00e9 et produits d\u00e9riv\u00e9s selon les conventions \u00e9tablies.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Baynes Sound Capteur d'Oxyg\u00e8ne d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 2023-08-23\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/e7b2ee2e-97b1-4203-b277-81c3805da2b2?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"e7b2ee2e-97b1-4203-b277-81c3805da2b2\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"05\", \"24\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 632518 was deployed on 2023-08-23 at Baynes Sound. Baynes Sound is located between Denman Island and Vancouver Island. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Baynes Sound Oxygen Sensor Deployed 2023-08-23\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/e7b2ee2e-97b1-4203-b277-81c3805da2b2?local=en\"}]

          <mcc:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>The EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset is a structured dataset of Coordinate Reference Systems and Coordinate Transformations, accessible through this online registry (www.epsg-registry.org) or, as downloadable zip files, through IOGP's EPSG home page at www.epsg.org. The geographic coverage of the data is worldwide, but it is stressed that the dataset does not and cannot record all possible geodetic parameters in use around the world.</gco:CharacterString>

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 632518 was deployed on 2023-08-23 at Baynes Sound. Baynes Sound is located between Denman Island and Vancouver Island. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="fra">Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 632518 a été déployé le 2023-08-23 au Baynes Sound. Baynes Sound est située entre Denman Island et l’Île de Vancouver. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxygène. Les capteurs d'oxygène mesurent la concentration d'oxygène dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:status>
        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelist/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="completed"/>
      </mri:status>
      <mri:topicCategory>
        <mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>oceans</mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>
      </mri:topicCategory>

          <mac:type>
            <gco:CharacterString>Sea-Bird SBE 63 dissolved oxygen sensor</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:type>
          <mac:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>An optode dissolved oxygen sensor mounted in plastic (600m operating depth) or titanium (7000m operating depth) housing that interfaces through an RS-232 connection to SeaCAT  or MicroCAT CTDs or Navis Argo float. Accuracy is the greater of 3 micromole/kg or 2%. More information is available at http://www.seabird.com/products/spec_sheets/63data.htm.</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:description>
        </mac:MI_Instrument>
      </mac:instrument>
    </mac:MI_AcquisitionInformation>

name: e7b2ee2e-97b1-4203-b277-81c3805da2b2
notes: The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 632518 was deployed on 2023-08-23 at Baynes Sound. Baynes Sound is located between Denman Island and Vancouver Island. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.

notes_translated.en: The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 632518 was deployed on 2023-08-23 at Baynes Sound. Baynes Sound is located between Denman Island and Vancouver Island. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.
notes_translated.fr: Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 632518 a été déployé le 2023-08-23 au Baynes Sound. Baynes Sound est située entre Denman Island et l’Île de Vancouver. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxygène. Les capteurs d'oxygène mesurent la concentration d'oxygène dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.

title: Baynes Sound Oxygen Sensor Deployed 2023-08-23

description.fr: Accueil des données canadiennes sur l'océan Pacifique
description.en: Home of Canada's Pacific Ocean Data

resources.description: Data is delivered via ERDDAP, a data server that gives a standardized way to download subsets of datasets in common file formats. This particular ERDDAP installation has oceanographic data from Ocean Networks Canada's instruments

description_translated.en: Data is delivered via ERDDAP, a data server that gives a standardized way to download subsets of datasets in common file formats. This particular ERDDAP installation has oceanographic data from Ocean Networks Canada's instruments

resources.name: ERDDAP
